text: L95. Computing Maximurn File Size for Multi-level Indices Consider a file system with a blocksize of 4096 and disk addresses of length 4 bytes. If we represent files using a multi-level index with 1 pointer stored directly in the file metadata and a maximum of 2 levels of index blocks, what is the maximum size file (in KB) that can be represented? (You must enter your answer as a single integer value; no arithmetic expressions allowed -- sorry). integer KB @ Save & Grade Single attempt â€˜Additional attempts available with new variants @
